description: Enterprise techniques used by Group5, ATT&CK group G0043 v1.1
name: Group5 (G0043)

techniques.comment: Malware used by Group5 is capable of remotely deleting files from victims.
Malware used by Group5 is capable of capturing keystrokes.
Group5 disguised its malicious binaries with several layers of obfuscation, including encrypting the files.
Malware used by Group5 is capable of watching the victim's screen.
Group5 packed an executable by base64 encoding the PE file and breaking it up into numerous lines.
Group5 C2 servers communicated with malware over TCP 8081, 8282, and 8083.
